title: Yorick Buff?
body:
Does he need one? (probably) did he get one last patch? no plz-erino rito

(if a riot member can reply) lol

replies.body:
just saying if you play him now.. NO ONE absolutely no one knows wtf he does..
So just play him and its basically freelo

> [{quoted}](name=Critterous,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KlbetOlo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-24T10:36:40.228+0000)
>
> just saying if you play him now.. NO ONE absolutely no one knows wtf he does..
> So just play him and its basically freelo

But with the tank meta everyone is trying to learn how to kite/BUILD FUCKING BORK  and isnt yorick kite-able?

This is true... Except the part about the tank meta...
Were out of that boy its all bout dem assassins

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KlbetOlo,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-24T10:50:03.097+0000)
>
> But with the tank meta everyone is trying to learn how to kite/BUILD FUCKING BORK  and isnt yorick kite-able?

isn't he a) mega slow and b) very "ima nuke you now" in terms of commitment to fights

>

Kite? with omens?

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KlbetOlo,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-24T12:20:14.786+0000)
>
> Kite? with omens?

But its a clos range cc you might have to ghost/flash for it to affect them, and they can still qss (or merc sceptor it)

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KlbetOlo,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-24T12:21:57.502+0000)
>
> But its a clos range cc you might have to ghost/flash for it to affect them, and they can still qss (or merc sceptor it)

I have never played yorick so I don't know how tbh but cant he just burn their counters with double or triple ghouls?

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KlbetOlo,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-24T12:33:13.490+0000)
>
> I have never played yorick so I don't know how tbh but cant he just burn their counters with double or triple ghouls?

Burn there qss and cleanses (those things) with ghouls? i doubt they would waste it on that , tho they arent really types of cc they are sustain dmg etc based monsters. Also they can be smited so smite tp top lane is op against him (or smite ignite)
He most likely won't get touched until he gets a rework.

> [{quoted}](name=MeIanchoIy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KlbetOlo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-24T09:11:31.449+0000)
